title: European Bank for Reconstruction and Development - Wikipedia
snippet: Currently (2024-2025) Slovenia is the Chair of Board of Governors, while Iceland and Turkey are the Vice Chairs. The Board of Directors consists of 23 members elected by the Board of Governors. These members can not be on the Board of Governors. Its function is to direct the general operations ...

title: EBRD to appoint new Vice President, Chief Risk Officer

title: EBRD to welcome Greg Guyett as First Vice President and Head of Client Services Group
snippet: The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) has appointed Greg Guyett as its new First Vice President and Head of Client Services Group. Mr Guyett will take up his position on 1 September 2025.
